word: You'll need more experience before we break into 103. Accept the first task and get off the PC.
Associate action points are used up!
Climb ivy on walls. Run longer and faster. Fall damage height reduced.
Walk through vents. Crouch speed increased. Fall damage height reduced.
Carrying heavy items is much faster. Crouch speed even faster.  Fall damage height reduced a lot.
All tenants are out of the house. No one to the mark!
THERE IS NO FUCKING WASHING MACHINE
These MORONS gave me a broken TV! How can they??? I'm rich, I demand to be treated like a queen. It's not my fault I broke it. It should have withstood my forces. I require a refund, ASAP!
Are you sure you want to quit Menu?
Are you sure you want to quit the game? Unsaved progress will be lost.
Are you sure you want to load a save? Current progress will be lost.
Are you sure you want to quit?
Are you sure you want to start a new game?

To invite your associate, take out your phone {take_out_phone}, select the correct button and press it. She will arrive shortly. You can signal her to do certain things, such as lockpicking a lock, mark tenants, or carry a heavy item to your car. Inviting your associate costs 100$.
Each upgrade grants 1 additional action point (default is 3).
Green - number in the correct spot
[HINT: DO NOT USE THE SAME NUMBER TWICE!]
Yellow - good number, but wrong spot
Better audio system for your home. Unlocks a full range of songs.
Increase your max weight by 10kg for 10 minutes.
A save file was detected in Slot nr 1. When you start a new game, that save will be overwritten. Would you like to back it up?
Sometimes, your heavy items from the shed can be stolen. This camera will prevent that.
Central bank on the outskirts. Keeps small reserves of gold bars. Three guards, two workers.
Silver gold watch in a safe.
200$ penalty for using a blunt weapon
The best pay on the dark web
Allow you to mark tenants and highlight loot through walls.
Check out Blackbay. You can sell items you stole through there. They sometimes offer much better prices than the pawn shop, so keep an eye out.
Everyone leaves at 7 and comes back at 8.
Allows you to buy the blowtorch. Makes courier car & container burglary possible.
Makes lockpicking with this tool easier.
Shadowhawk GT was transported to your hideout
There is a cardboard box with my stuff inside. Fuckers were supposed to send it to me, but it's still there.
It's heavy so put it in your trunk, and bring it home.

1. Use the story fix cheat:
- Go to your inventory in-game
- Press Left Ctrl+E
- Type in "Fix Story" and press Enter.
- If that did nothing, you can use one of your backup saves at C:\Users\USER NAME\AppData\LocalLow\CookieDev\Thief Simulator 2\backups

2. So, just use your backup save. Copy it, replace the original saveData.thief file with it, start the game and press 'Continue'.
3. Hopefully that helped.
People were made aware of robberies in the area. Everyone is on high alert.
So you have the tool - you can practice on a lock-in 102 if you want. Practice is always good.
Break into 103, and steal the drone. It's big so you can't miss it. Just make sure to check your journal and see when the guy is out.
Hey, have you tried completing some contracts? It makes good money and provides experience. Try it out.

Before we go at something bigger, I want you to try your luck at the Forestside Resort. It's filled with rich people and tons of shiny things. I will transfer the data about all loot and tenants to you.
Alright, mister thief. You got this. I need diamond earrings, they're probably at the house 2C. Big chance they're locked in a cabinet.
Actually, there's something I need from there. I will pay generously for it. When you're there, I will give you a call.
A guy before you chickened out mid-job and buried the key to the cabinet somewhere in the resort. A disaster of a guy, let me tell you. You gotta find it.
When you have it, find the earrings and send them to me via Blackbay. If you can manage this, we will rob a certain warehouse next. Good luck.
See, that saved you the need to go through the journal. My sources say he leaves the house at 5 p.m. There's a problem, though.
You can't break in with the crowbar, because the guy has a sound alarm. It will be triggered. You gotta learn lockpicking.
Drive to your new hideout, and check the computer. I have a task for you which will give you some more experience.
Ain't this house nice? Just pay me the rent weekly and you're fine. When you get some cash, you can do repairs on HouseRenovator.
Go to the computer. I have to show you around in your new world.
Call off pursuit: Remove one police star. Costs 2 action points.
Hey, listen. How's your muscle? I want you to steal 10 heavy items to prove you're ready for what's to come.
Listen. You need to do everything you can at 201 - all tasks, all loot. My friend, Vinny, hates the big guy who lives there. We want him pissed off.
My friend has a contract with HellNeighbour - each done job gives him a cut. I need you to complete 25 jobs. Good luck.
They're coming. You have one minute.
It would be really funny if you got caught. A man escapes trained assassins, but can't escape a policeman who ate a donut as he ran to the crime scene.
Time to learn lockpicking. If you still somehow don't have the experience, steal some more from 102.
Good, brother. Take out your phone and order a nice basic lockpicking tool. You can buy it on your PC too, but it'd be a waste of time to drive there.
You got it? Cool. You need to upgrade it so it can disable cameras - there's a camera at the entrance to 104.
Sell some loot and check out Dronetech on your computer. Take your time.
So, two guys at 104, but they both leave at a certain time. You should check it out in your journal.
Go there, disable the camera at the entrance with your drone, and I'll call you about your next step.
Okay, I assume you have the box and it didn't fall out of your trunk. Open it like a normal man does, with a knife.
What is inside, must remain a mystery. Send it to me via Blackbay, once you have it.
Great, you're helping me right now. I will make sure to repay that. There are a few more things though.
I need you to plant a certain package at 110, in the bedroom. Be careful though, you can't be seen by the guy.
Alright, so you're in some deep shit. It took long enough. Look, you're my friend and all, I'll help you get out of this mess but not for free.
Thank you. Two more things, kind sir. I need a photo of the kitchen in 105.
Try a test lockpick at your hideout, because you're going to jail. I'm not kidding. I'll explain once you practice.
Buy all the info about 116 on RobTips. It's a police station, which you will visit. Why? I shall explain. Buy these tips first.
Great! You can use the drone to scope out the area, mark the tenants, all that stuff. Makes your life easier. You can also buy upgrades on DroneTech.
Time for you to learn a new lockpicking skill. Steal some more, do some jobs. By the time they hopefully call you, you gotta be ready.
You're a godsend. Really. As a way to say thanks, she's gonna steal with you if you call her up. She can help you in many ways.
So, to work my magic, I need a briefcase from 108. It contains info about Lombardi's rivals - if we send it to Lombardi's boss, he might rethink killing you.
Hell, he might even think you're useful now. What a way to turn things around. Get me that briefcase pronto.
Lombardi's boss should call you anytime now. Learn Agility, it might prove useful on whatever he tasks you with - assuming he won't send a squad of assassins your way. I hope.
Well, well. You've got me to call you, while I should have you in my basement as we speak.
You have a whole criminal organization going after you. Let me think what can be done.
Let's see. You steal half a million from us in some kind of a self-vengeance project, you run off and think it's all over. Well, guess what, it's not.
It's a miracle you're still alive. You have to thank your friend for that, as what he sent to us is very valuable. He is the reason I let you live, for now.
You will do a few things for me, including paying back the money. For now, I need you to cause a mess at 109. Do everything you can there - steal all stuff, do all tasks.
Listen, we're not gonna get that money back by stealing from locals. We have to go for something bigger. A heist, I mean. Check the whiteboard at your hideout.

Great job, onto the next - it's a local warehouse with all sorts of stuff. We'll need several things, but most importantly, a map of the 
area. I happen to know where it is.
The map is at 107, locked away in a cabinet. However, listen to this. The tenants had a locksmith copy a key to the cabinet. He made one more copy for himself, imagine that.
He's in Madison Street, walking around. The guy has pink hair, so hard to miss. Pickpocket his ass.
Honestly, I'm kinda enjoying this. Guiding you through this disaster makes me feel alive. You're probably thrilled as well.
Break into 107 and find the cabinet, open the cabinet, take the map. What else can I explain to you? How to walk? Get to work so we can enjoy life for a little longer.
Alright, time for some real action. This time everything important will be marked for you, thanks to the warehouse plan. The next heist might not be that easy.
Let's say, you piss off a few people, break into a couple of houses, and then you get my help. How's that?
Make sure you're ready. I'll call you once you're there.
Brilliant work. I'll sell the forklift, don't worry about it. That's 30 000$ deducted from your debt. Not much, but we're just getting started.
You need to get the automatic lockpick next. Time to go for the bigger fish in the pond now.
30 000$? I expect 3 times that next time. Also, I tracked one guy's deliveries and he ordered a very nice bracelet. He keeps it in a safe, in 111.
Steal it, cut it up and send it via Blackbay. Business as usual.
Do you have the jewelry tools? If not, you gotta buy them on Stealgear.
The decent job there. I don't trust you one bit but maybe there's a future for you. I need a few interior photos of 106. Get it done, and I'll cut some more debt.
You know what's funny? We bailed out our former associate from jail. He owes us 100 000$. My friend, Vinny tells him what to do, like a dog. I enjoy doing that to you.
The guy from 106 just bought a car. I want some parts from it. I'm building a nice ride, and can't get these parts anywhere.
Get a garage and steal that car.
What's with the silence, man? Are you cutting me out? Remember I want my part as well. You need my help.
For starters, I'd go to 102 and steal some shit from there. It should be empty. Use your crowbar to get inside.
So we're stealing a car, I see. Just make sure to open the gate last. It will make some noise.
I need the gearbox and catalytic converter. Send them to me via Blackbay once you're done.
Hey, listen. I need something quick and easy done, and you get to explore a brand new neighborhood. Deal?
Go to 204 in Hillville and drop this note at garage 2A. Don't read it. Thanks in advance.
Thank you, that makes my life easier. For now, learn to hack electronics. Boss wants a laptop stolen, but it's probably locked.
You get me a laptop from 207. Then you blow the place up. Maybe not a good idea, though. Just get me the laptop and unlock it.
Learn some specialization, man. We need to blow up a container. I'll explain more later.
Basically, someone is building a meth lab disguised as a store in Hillville. Lombardi's boss doesn't need rivals there, so you get to take them out.
Blow up the containers at the site. Just make sure to put the bombs inside of the containers, and as soon as you do, run. Good luck.
Someone spotted your car and reported it, man. Go to the Car Service and paint it some other color, asap.
Very nice. Time to sell this stuff so you can pay me, brother. Drive to Crazy Joe's pawnshop, he's my pal.
Learn to steal good cars. I'll help drop your debt by a ton if you get me a nice car.
Get me the car from 206 in Hillville. I'll make sure you have less debt after that's done.
I just need the body, so you can sell the car as a whole at the Car Service. Take out whatever parts you please, I don't care.
You can get quick cash by hacking an ATM. Go to Madison St. and hack one. Then send me the money, hehe. Joking.
I see you're working with some guy. You better not have any stupid ideas, you know, like the first time.
Get some sleeping gas and I'll call you then.
A man from 203 is cheating on his wife, and he's trying to get it on with my daughter-in-law. I need you to fuck up their residence, steal everything you can, you name it.
I can whisper some good words to the boss so he doesn't hang you once you pay your debt. I have a request.
Get to 113 and disable a security panel for cameras. Then, snap me a few photos around the house.
Great job, you may survive this. I'd get some rest if I were you though. Something big is coming.
It's in the same neighborhood , number 115.
When you steal things and complete jobs, you get experience. With enough experience, you can learn new skills, such as lockpicking, which is needed to break into 103.
I don't know what's going on, but there are black SUVs outside my window. What the fuck, man? Do you know something about this?
We need to do the last hit on some bank and I'm bailing, man. Fuck this shit. First, they find you, now it seems they found me.
Buy a hacking laptop. We'll need it for sure. I think I need a gun...
You need to go to 202 and steal the bank construction plan. The guy works at the bank so he should have it all. You'll need the laptop to get onto the property. They're well protected.
Use the hacking laptop to hack the front gate security panel. Otherwise, you won't get in. Be careful, and bring a baton for guards, just in case.
We're doing it, man. The last heist. So much money for us, and obviously, you'll pay back the debt and we're free then.
Be very careful though, the place is crawling with guards and workers. Find a good time to get in there. Grab as much gold as you can and escape.

Ah, I almost forgot. You need a tranquilizer gun. Some of the guards are right by the entrance to the gold depository, no going past them without sleeping them. Do some jobs, save up the cash, and get it.
Send them the gold via Blackbay. I want my share too, brother. We'll meet soon. And we have to celebrate this.
We got the gold. Good job, you're officially clear of all debt. Well, not.
Get to 102 and complete the job you just accepted. Should be rather easy.
Your friend, is the one who helped you with all this. He's going to die. What, you thought that's it? You stole from us. Deceived us. Now somebody gotta pay the ultimate price.
Meet him somewhere quiet in Madison Street. My people will take care of the rest. Don't worry, you're safe. You have my word.
You've done as I asked, and I keep my word. You're a free man now. Who knows, maybe in the future we will even work together again. For now, I leave you to yourself.
Can you imagine, this motherfucker killed Vinny! Look, I'm sorry I clipped your friend. I want to redeem that, somehow.

Remember when I told you about the guy who owed us 100 000$? Well, he paid it back, Vinny did something stupid, and then the guy took revenge and killed Vinny. Well, now I'm gonna kill him! I need your help though.
I will clue you on the details soon, but if you help me, I will make a millionaire. You will never have to worry about money. You will live like a king. I promise you that.
That dingus next door called the cops. Hide in the dumpster, or something!
You were caught by the camera!
Allows you to disable one more camera
I can buy it in parts.
This camera is immune to your drone!
You can't leave while actively followed! Escape the police first
Can't load during a police chase in hardcore mode
To disable a car alarm, interact with the front bumper. Press {use_item} three times when the arrow is in range of a grey panel. Failing to do so will trigger the alarm.
Your car is blocking the road!
Set of tools that make the car disassembly process faster.
The door's jammed. You can break in with the crowbar
Your car was found by the police!

To hack the ignition, interact with the steering wheel. 6 numbers will be displayed. You need to connect those on the left, to those on the right to form the number displayed at the top. It's mostly mathematics.
Upgrade your car storage capacity by 10kg, each upgrade.
Steal older cars without an alarm. Use a pickgun to open doors. Garage required.
Steal cars with alarms. Hack ignition with a PDA tool.
Unlocks a car signal hijacker. Hijack car signal from the owner. Works mostly on expensive cars.
Place the cardboard box in the trunk
Stealing older cars goes like this: you pick the lock open using the tool. Enter the car and connect all cables in the correct order based on sparks [RMB / Left Trigger to ignite].
You see, there is a cat here. He chose you, so it'd be better to accept that and buy him some nice things. In return, he will give you 100XP a week, instead of 25.
-5% chance for tenants to notice something's wrong (opened doors, missing items etc.)
Whishlist my new game - Crime Simulator, with 4 player co-op!
Claim your rewards on the website
Allows you to climb ivy on fences.
Keeps you invisible for a brief amount of time.
Crowbar & hand colors were unlocked for 0$. Enjoy!
There is a computer in the spare room.
Contract item found! Send it via ThiefContract

I buy everything. Well, almost. 
Stolen things are preferable.

To sell big items, just drop them on the floor and talk to me.

Developers

Lead developer - CookieDev
Level design - CookieDev
Game story - CookieDev
Voice acting - MrMaingo, julianfoster175
House design - x o t i c
Testing - Playway QA, L Ryuzaki Lawliet

Thank you for playing & stay tuned for new content!

Game design: CookieDev
Level design: CookieDev, xotic
Story: CookieDev
Programming: CookieDev
Voice Acting: Mr. Maingo, julianfoster175
Game testing: Playway QA, L Ryuzaki Lawliet
I swear something is haunting these woods. I can see a figure walking in the trees at night. Great vacation I'm having.
Do you want to steal, fight & more in co-op?
Well, this is a bank. If you deposit money here, it will grow by [x] weekly. That's it. Oh, and you can prevent losing any cash in jail.
Would you like to adjust the graphics settings for Steam Deck? (Experimental)

They say the devil resides here. Time seems not to pass normally. Apparently the previous owner left some valuable belongings before his disappearence. Can you retrieve them, before you vanish as well?
Stealing from Frank was not approved
Don't you dare steal from Crazy Joe...
You're making a lot of noise!
The drone is losing signal. You are too far away!
Can't use a drone during a police chase

Press {activate_drone} to launch the drone. Use W, S, A, D / Left Stick to move around, {drone_up} to fly up and {drone_down} to fly down. Be aware of the distance and battery. Tenants will call the police if they see the drone in their possession.
Abandoned farm near the Mexico border. It's used by some sicarios for storing drugs. Going here is a certain death sentence, if you get caught, of course.
Difficult for people who want to enjoy the stealing part without worrying too much about getting caught.
Disable security panels with a special PDA. Hack stolen electronics to be able to sell them. Hack ATMs.
Unlocks a remote hacking laptop. Disable security panels from far away.
Unlocks a remote hacking laptop. Disable security panels from far away.
Pockets are empty. Try on someone else
Would you like to enable the controller?
To escape the police, either hide in a spot such as under the bed/trash can, stay away from the red area on the minimap, or simply leave the location.

Extra skill points can be earned basically by selling items and getting XP. You can use them to earn one of the new extra skills - however - you need to have a certain thief rating before you can earn specified skills. How does the rating work?

Check out the app on your phone called 'ThiefRating'. To put it simply, the more successful your break-ins are, the more missions you complete, the more money you make, the higher your rating will be.
Most people leave at 16 and come back at 18.
It's locked, so worthless to me.
Press {flashlight} to use the flashlight. It makes it much easier to spot, so be careful.
Follow our publisher to unlock all <color=cyan>crowbar</color> and <color=yellow>hand</color> colors for free!
The rich and mighty rest here. They usually bring their expensive stuff on vacation with them, so you might be in for a treat.

ANY GERMS MUST BE LEFT OUTSIDE. ANY BUGS, INSECTS ARE NOT ALLOWED!!!
I BUY ALMOST EVERYTHING JUST LIKE MY BROTHER JOE. I HOPE HE'S ALIVE BECAUSE HE'S MY BROTHER
No story - do whatever you want.
This game was made by one person.
Motion blur is off by default.
The game will save automatically when you exit a running car.
The first save slot gets overwritten a lot. If you want to keep a save, save on some other slots too.
You can't cancel contracts, so choose wisely.
Game completion counts completed residences, contracts, stolen cars and Blackbay lists.
When you get a 3-star chase, the helicopter will come and shoot at you.
If someone is below or above you, they can't hear you.
There is a demon doll somewhere in Madison St.
You can enable survival mode in gameplay settings and enjoy paying 5x the normal rent, and also eating fast-food.
You can teleport back to your car using your phone.
In the upcoming DLC, you can become a CEO.
There are stashes hidden around the map.
The game is loading about 60 000 objects right now.
You can quicksave at almost any point with F5.
Very expensive art and jewelery is stored here for all to see, but not for all to take. You might be the exception. It's a quite heavily guarded building though.

1. Lower your texture quality.
2. Check if your computer is meeting the requirements.
3. If you have below 4GB RAM, this game won't work.
4. If the game is still crashing and you still don't know why, go to  C:/Users/MY NAME/AppData/Local/Temp/CookieDev/Thief Simulator 2/Crashes.
5. Send me the whole folder (mrciastku@gmail.com).

The garage allows you to store stolen cars and take out their parts for selling.
It also unlocks a purchasable sports car at the Car Service.
A good investment, to be precise.
You just refilled your car gas for [x]$
My associate, who's also a thief, was caught and is currently stuck in jail. You will go there, break out, break her out, and escape together.
If you manage to do that, I will do anything I can to help you. It's a promise. So, do something stupid and get caught.
There is a gramophone inside the house.
Robbing a bunch of armed men in enclosed space? What a great idea. Remember, this is America. If you get caught, kiss your ass goodbye.
Hack security panel to unlock garage door

Hacking the ATMs can give you a lot of cash, real fast. You have to do it right, though. There are several rows of numbers - you must arrange them in the correct order to break the system. As many rows are there, that many tries you have.

Some doors are locked with electronic locks. The same goes for certain electronics, such as expensive laptops. To unlock an electric lock, you need a hacking PDA. Build a path out of the 'corridors' to the main entry. You need only one correct path to hack the lock.
Change the color of your gloves.
Perception becomes useless - no NPC highlight, no highlight on the minimap. Items are not highlighted.
Hard mode-locked in settings. When caught by police, lose all your loot. Bailing out costs all your money. Only one save slot. 1.5x XP.

1. Refund the game.
2. If you can't refund it, take a deep breath, go take a nice, comfy shower, then come back.
3. Ask yourself - do you really hate this game so much?
4. If the answer is still yes, take another deep breath.
5. Still hate this game?
6. Ok. In this case, I offer my sincere condolences for your suffering.
7. Give it a negative review, punch the wall, do something to let that anger out.
A reward has been revealed. Follow the marker on the minimap
Decrease people's hearing range by 1 meter.
Decrease people's hearing range by 3 meters.
Heavy item carry: Pick up the heavy item you choose [look at it and interact], and carry it to your car. Costs 1 action point.
Heavy items must be placed in the trunk. Open your trunk as seen on the video, place the item inside, and close the trunk.
Heavy item was dropped off near your car
Heavy items placed in the car
Alright, I hope you're mentally and physically ready. You have to find the key to the forklift, it is probably in a safe somewhere.
Grab it, maybe disable the cameras to make life easier, and drive the forklift out of here.
Heists are not available in the demo

Heists are high-profile robberies of heavily guarded places. They can be started indefinitely - as long as you want to make sure you've found all the loot. To unlock loot info, hints and guard's routines, you need to find a specific document (usually found in houses).
Go to HellNeighbour. Like I said before, you need more experience before you can learn lockpicking. Accept the job at 102.
Hello there, fellow thief! Once you're done emptying people's houses and pockets, take a minute to do a quick pool about the demo, down here:
A security panel to the main door, in the guard's booth.
Electric fuse box which controls exterior cameras, on the side of the building.
Security panel managing interior cameras, upstairs in a room.
Security panel controlling the vault door, downstairs.
Security panel controlling all laser alarms, on the ground floor.

You're tired of your house looking like absolute shit? We're here to help. We will fix all gaps, repair broken floor and/or ceiling, clean your dirty socks off everything and just make you happy again. Bad thing though - this will cost you 2500$.
The camera is on the left side and at the back.
The guard never leaves the area.
You can turn off the cameras in the electric box.
Super TV in the living room.
The husband leaves at 9 and comes back at 17.
The wife leaves with the dog at 20 and comes back at 22.
There is a gate at the back.
Alarm on a drawer in the bedroom.
There's a broken fence behind the home.
A smartphone on a table in the garden.
A projector in a drawer, in the bedroom.
A camera in the bedroom is safe.
Tenant leaves at 17 and comes back at 21.
You can enter through a ladder in the back garden.
There's a power switch inside (switches off cameras).
There's a camera in the back garden.
There is a sound alarm which detects loud noise.
PC unit in the main room.
A worker comes in at 12:00 and leaves at 0:00.
Another worker comes in at 1:00 and leaves at 11:00.
Two cameras - one at the front gate, and the other at the back.
Acoustic guitar in a locked room.
The customer comes in at 16 and leaves at 20.
Zoni's flat TV in the living room.
Redlens' cinema camera in the bedroom is safe.
The male tenant leaves at 8 and comes back at 17.
The female tenant stays home all day.
The maid comes in at 8 and leaves at 18.
All windows except the garage have window shutters. Active at night.
The male tenant stays home all day. Sleeps 3:00-12:00.
The guy's wife leaves with the dog at 8, and comes back at 10.
One camera near the front door, and another camera in the back garden.
All windows have window shutters. Active at night.
Old TV in the living room.
The key to the basement is upstairs.
Super TV in the living room.
The male tenant leaves at 9 and comes back at 18.
You can climb the creeper on the back fence.
All windows except the kitchen have window shutters.
Old TV in the living room.
Tenant leaves at 16 and comes back at 19.
Stash in the basement - tenant has the key.
Antique wall clock in the living room.
VR Headset upstairs, in a cabinet.
The male tenant leaves at 12 and comes back at 14.
The female tenant leaves at 19 and comes back at 22.
A camera at the garden entrance.
There is an elevation to the first-floor window.
Samlong's TV in the living room.
Silver bracelet in the bedroom safe.
Ride Rover in the garage. No alarm.
Woman nr 1 stays home all day.
Woman nr 2 leaves at 7 and comes back at 14.
You can enter through a vent at the back.
Bass guitar upstairs, in the bedroom.
The man leaves at 8 and comes back at 17.
A woman leaves at 17 and comes back at 20.
The daughter stays home all day.
All windows have alarms, except one.
One window upstairs is open (with no alarm).
Cinema camera in a safe upstairs.
Golden female sculpture in the garage.
Thunderdrive car in the garage. Signal required.
The guard comes in at 20 and leaves at 8.
The key to the front door is upstairs.
Laser alarms are active 23-7. Can't hack remotely.
There is a ladder in the back garden.
The man in a white shirt has a key to the car (signal).
Cinema camera in a safe, inside the white container.
The camera pointing at the containers in the back.
Breakable crates with items, stored inside the containers.
Black car rims in the garage.
PC monitor in the red container.
A game console in the living room.
The man is home all day.
A woman leaves for two hours at 13.
Guard comes to work at 23 and leaves at 7.
You can enter the bedroom through a vent.
Golden dragon statue in a safe upstairs.
Gaming console in the dining room.
Vintage Vixen GT in the garage.
The man stays home all day.
The woman stays home all day.
The entrance gate has an alarm.
The house is equipped with security lasers.
Old camcorder in the metal cabinet.
The front gate can be only opened remotely, or from inside.
You can climb a scaffold behind the house.
They have a dog which can eat you.
There is a smoke detector in the kitchen.
All windows have alarms (hard security panels).
SSD drive in a safe in garage 4A.
You can enter garage 4A through a vent.
Gaming laptop in a room upstairs.
Smithford's watch in the safe upstairs.
Golden cash register in the garage.
The man is home all day.
The boy in the green shirt is out 15-17.
The boy in an orange hoodie is home all day.
You have to hack the front gate remotely.
The man is armed with his fists.
The garage door can't be hacked remotely (needs a laptop upgrade).
Golden face statue in the safe upstairs.
Samlong's TV in the living room.
The man leaves at 7 and comes back at 13.
A woman leaves at 14 and comes back at 16.
The daughter leaves at 19 and comes back at 22.
The boy leaves at 8 and comes back at 12.
You can climb the creeper behind the house.
All windows, except the garage, have alarms.
The security panel for cameras is upstairs.
Zoni's wall TV in the living room.
The man is home all day.
The woman walks the dog at 11 and returns at 12.
All entrance doors have an electric lock, gate included.
There is a back gate without an electric lock.
Samlong's tablet is in the office container.
Conference phone in a cabinet, inside the container.
A worker comes in at 7 and leaves at 18.
Roof has a weight detection alarm.
Security panel for cameras is in the building in the back. Can't be hacked remotely.
All windows have alarms. Security panel is in the side building. Can't be hacked remotely.
All doors have alarms. Security panel is in the building behind the museum.
Four guards, all armed. One worker who is unarmed.
There are A LOT of cameras. Most can't be hacked by a drone.
All display boxes have alarms. Security panel inside the building.
Gate switch inside the shooting range.
Security panel for cameras inside the shooting range.
Several cameras outside, one camera inside the shooting range.
Diamond earrings in house 2C, inside a locker.
Two armed guards, one leaves for a few hours.
The guard is armed and on location all day.
There are several, not marked cameras.
No one is armed besides the guard.
There is a golf cart which can be driven and stolen.
The key to the locker with earrings is buried in a grass pile. Shovel needed.
Houses 2A and 2B are unoccupied but guards check them out.
Decent SSD in the boss room.
iMak in the office on floor 2.
The camera security panel is in the conference room.
The exit door key is in the conference room.
Did someone drop you on your head while you were born? Next time I will slash your tires, you dumb dummy freak. Your IQ is the equivalent of my toaster. Fellow 202 owner.

Do you mean, you don't know what to do in the game? First, I would read the message in the top left corner, near a yellow diamond. It's what the game wants you to do, it's right there.

Still don't know what to do? Start a new game and read every sign, every text you see. Usually these messages are there to help you, not annoy you.

Still lost? Well, now I'm lost too. You can make a new discussion on Steam or Discord and hopefully someone helps you progress through the game.
Everyone is undecided on what to do - their habits may randomly change more often.
Great stuff, now you can disable a camera with your drone. It will come in handy a lot.
Buy all info about 104 on RobTips, so there are no surprises. I won't hold your hand for much longer.

If you're ever in trouble, you know where to
find me'
Invite your friend with a controller over Steam Remote Play
Highlights items that are worth over 100$ for 5 minutes.

Hey, I've been there too. I left a crowbar to make your life easier, fellow criminal. Those donut-loving bastards can go fuck themselves. Oh, and you could get my package from Madison. 42318. It won't be of any use to me. 
- Mysterious stranger

To sell jewelry, you must cut it into pieces first. For that, you need a jewelry tool which you can buy on Stealgear. Once you have it, go to the table in your house's hallway and begin the minigame. You must move the camera and cut all pieces out by holding {use_item}.

Some luxury cars need a hacked signal to be unlocked. You can use the car signal hijacker to do so. Find the person who has the original key (usually the owner), look at them and press {use_item}. Once you have the signal, you can enter the car and run it. The signal lasts 180 seconds.
Knock out guard in the suit
People who were knocked down / put to sleep will stay down for 1.5x longer.
Allows you to hack 'unhackable' panels remotely, and increases signal distance.
To learn the tenant's habits, look at him directly and press {mark_npc}. Learned habits can be displayed in the inventory.
Leave drone mode to use inventory
Good, you get the hang of it. You can browse other websites, there are plenty, but not crucial for us now. Get off the PC when you're ready.
Level [x] is required to read this book
You have leveled up. Use your new points in the 'Skills' menu.
Each new item you steal brings you 10x more experience. Once you gain a new level, use the acquired skill points to learn a new skill.
Hacking laptop can be used to disable security panels remotely (cameras, door locks etc.). You can upgrade it on your computer to increase hack distance.
You can sell cars as a whole, but it won't be as profitable. Take them apart instead.
Some items are marked as special (pink color). Once stolen, you get one special skill point you can use in your 'Skills' tab.
When your backpack is full of loot, you make more noise while walking and running.
You can upgrade your tools on UpgradeIt, on your PC. It makes lockpicking easier, so not a bad investment. You can also customize your gloves!
While using a hacking laptop, you can switch between detected panels by pressing {interact}.
There are stashes hidden around the map. You can find notes regarding their location in some houses.
Before using sleeping gas, make sure to put on a respirator. You can refill the gas at your house, near the front door.
When you get spotted, it's best to run away or hide somewhere. Make sure not to be seen entering a hiding spot - police will check it out ASAP.
People knocked out with a baton will wake up and call the police, however if you use the tranquilizer gun or sleeping gas, they won't.
Dogs have much better hearing and eyesight than people, so avoid walking near one. The best course of action is to lure the animal away with a treat.
When you see a lot of heavy items, it's a good idea to call up your associate and use their help. They can carry those items straight to your car.

Some items can be sold via BlackBay for a higher price than in the Pawn Shop. Remember, certain items DO NOT respawn when sold to the pawn shop! You might not be able to complete a BlackBay list if you're not careful.
You can re-lock opened doors, so no one finds out about forced entry and won't call the police. Just close the door, and press {relock_door}.
You can whistle by pressing {whistle} and lure people out. Just don't overdo it, or the tenant will call the cops.
Routines of many tenants during the night will change randomly - they're not the same every time. Some people wake up more often than others.
Did you know you have multiple save slots? If you anticipate something will go very wrong, you can do a tactical save. Well, unless you play on hardcore mode.
If you play on hardcore mode, once you go to jail, you can retrieve lost loot at the police station. You have to break out of the cell and find it.
You can use the crowbar to break open some doors and windows. It will make a ton of noise though, so it's not recommended unless you're in a hurry, or the house is empty.
Sometimes, vans with loot will appear on the streets. A blowtorch might be necessary to break in.
You can sell items at pawn shops located in each neighborhood. Alternatively, you can sell at a shipping box in your hideout, but with 10% less profit.
If you're feeling stuck, go to your home and browse the Web for any kind of tasks. Maybe someone needs a thing you already have in your bag and is willing to pay a lot for it?
Events don't impact the same houses each time they happen. Sometimes 103 tenants will leave for a festival, sometimes they will stay home.
If you knock down a tenant while he sees you, or during their escape, they will not stay down for as long as they would if you were hidden.
Your phone has some interesting apps you should check out - most notably, parcel codes and the calendar. Press {take_out_phone} to take out the phone.
When a tenant notices a missing item / open door, they will call the police and start exploring their residence, in search of the intruder.
Your visibility depends on a few factors - whether you are crouching, moving or static, and hit by light. You can see if you're visible by looking at the eye symbol on the minimap.
You can customize and upgrade your car at the Car Service. Change the color, give it more power, you name it.
After you hack an ATM, it will be locked out for a week.
When the police are called, you risk setting off 'burglar awareness day' as the next event for a few days. It means, people will be way more aware of any unusual changes.

You have a set of three abilities you can activate, which greatly help your thieving efforts. For example, an ability to highlight all items worth over 100$ - or to be completely unheard for two minutes. Be careful though, you can't have more than one ability active at a time, and they all have a cooldown.

If you need money and experience, you can accept contracts on ThiefContract. Each contract requires you to steal unique items from houses - none of those items are highlighted. Once you gain more reputation, better pay and harder tasks will become available.
To properly pickpocket someone, you need to look directly at them and make sure the hand icon is in the green bar's range. Some people may attack you if they spot you.
If you have money to spend, binoculars might be it. You can use them to mark tenants and highlight loot through walls.
Planning mode is a great way to find out what the tenant will do in the next few hours without reaching for your journal. Just look at him, and press [planning_mode].
Most stolen loot will reappear after 2-5 days, depending on the value. More expensive items will take longer to respawn.
When you get shot by police, you can use a medkit in your car to stop the bleeding. It replenishes once you visit your hideout.
When you're out in the open and need to hide, look for bigger bushes. Once you crouch in one, you're much better hidden.
When you go to jail, you don't lose your items but you have to pay some of your balance to bail out. Alternatively, you can break out.
Rain allows you to sneak more easily, as it's harder to hear your footsteps.
These books can be found in houses. Finding them grants 250XP, and they contain some cool tips about your profession.
When you mess up a burglary, people may recognize you after you come back into the neighborhood. Take off the posters, or buy a ski mask to prevent that.
You can get nice rewards on your PC for playing the game. Go on StolenRewards and see if you completed some lists.
We're gonna do something crazy, but first, you need to learn how to use lockpicks.
Do some jobs, steal some more. Stock up on lockpicks once you have the experience.
Lockpicking mode: Unlocks any lock you can unlock. Just look at it and interact. Uses 1 action point.
Allows you to pick easy locks, with the Basic Lockpicking Tool.
Allows you to pick medium locks, with an actual lockpick. Also, you can cut windows open with a tool.
Unlocks an automatic lockpick. Can be used on some more advanced locks.
Allows you to break into safes with a special tool.
Loot detection - detects loot, marks it and displays value
Uncover your past with these books, written by yourself. Learn why you are in such a situation. All that.

They destroyed my family. Everyone is addicted now. Sister is dead, my brother looks like a zombie - I somehow managed to stay clear. 
It's a mob, a mafia, they call them Lombardis. Some kind of a group. You don't fuck with them, or you will be digging your own grave soon, they say. I do not fucking care. Everyone I cared about was broken because of their drugs. 
I will get to them somehow. I'm not sure how yet, but I will figure it out.

I've researched a bit more about them - it's your typical group of shits who benefit from addicts and produce drugs like cocaine or methamphetamine, all across the USA. They have the police in their pockets - you bet, money did that. 
I have an idea. I will steal every single fucking penny they have. It won't bring back my sister, but it might help my brother.

I found a guy willing to help - he's a hacker. He might give me directions on where they keep their money, because sure as fuck it's not in the bank. He'll get a 20% cut if I manage to steal anything. 
I might need to learn how to break into places, lockpicking and stuff like that. Sneaky shit. I have to be ready for whatever happens next, and I'm devoted to fucking them up.

He got it - a warehouse somewhere on the outskirts of Hillville. Quite far but whatever. Guarded by two armed guys at all times. Supposedly, 750 000$ is stored there. It's not much for these fucks but it might be enough for me and my brother. 
I've been practicing with locks and I think I'm ready to go in. Sunday, 3:00 in the morning it is. Guards usually go into the locker room and eat donuts at that time.

I've done it. Those idiots didn't even see me running away with a full bag. It wasn't too hard, a crowbar was enough to get in. 
It's half a million in cash. Less than we expected, but still, it might be enough to help my brother - he has to move to a new place, away from all these fucking junkies. I have to help him get out of this shit, he's all that I have left. The hacker guy settled for a 50 000$ cut, as he's already rich and he knows I need the money more.

My brother is safe, far away from his destroyed friends. No longer dependent on this crap. Money has helped big time - with moving, with getting clean. It's almost great now, well, except for one thing. I think they have found me. These fuckers for sure don't give up when you rip them off. 
I saw a hooded guy walk past my new house. He was looking at my windows with binoculars - pretty fucking suspicious. On top of that, I live in the middle of nowhere now. No one just walks here like that. I think I might need to get out soon, but the problem is, I have zero money left. I gave it all away to my brother. God, who am I to complain? I will manage.
You lost some money from getting caught
You got caught and lost half your money. That's hardcore
See, that's how it goes. Keep the money, it will be for rent at your new hideout.
Alright, I bet he's somewhere visible at 3 PM , 15:00 military time. Wait it out in the parking lot, and then go to the spot I marked for you.
Have you got eyes on him? Mark his ass, so we know when he's out.
I need something from 104, and to break in there, we need a drone. It happens the guy from 103 ordered a drone recently.
Learn how to mark people. We have to find out when he goes to work.
Mark: Marks all tenants living at the current house you're near to. Costs 1 action point.
Highlight tenants by looking at them and learning their routines. Spot cameras. Unlocks planning mode.
People no longer recognize you after a failed robbery.
Max carry amount for this item
Increases the time it takes for a dog to eat it.

There are three types of parts - engine, suspension and wheel parts. To take off engine parts, the car must NOT be elevated. To take off the suspension parts, you must elevate the vehicle, go under it and look at it, then press {interact}. Wheel parts are taken off by looking at the wheel and pressing {interact}.
Place the micro camera in the mailbox and wait 24 hours to discover when tenants leave the home.
Steal the cardboard box from 102 & open it
I think your chances of survival just went up by, at least, 20%. I mean, after ripping off a known criminal organization, there's not much hope for a normal life. But you might be the exception.
For now, I want you to practice your skills by doing missions. Who knows what happens next? We gotta wait for their move, but not passively.
You must practice on a mannequin first
No more place in the locker!
No police on the horizon... Yet
Walk, running, opening doors makes no noise for 5 minutes.
Everything is as it usually is.
Typical Thief experience - everything is a challenge, but not heart attack inducing.

I sent you some notes about their storage units - coordinates and all the names of stuff they got stored in there. Just remember man, it's a brutal mob, we can't be caught breaking in there. We gotta plan this right. Get the package asap. 
Code: 16161
Honey, please pick up my package from the parcel locker. Code: 77611

I hate everyone. No one ever loved me, truly. No one respects me. I have no reason to do anything, because no matter what I do, I'm still drowning in sadness. I will put an end to it all, as soon as my project is complete.
You sick bastard, stop looking through my window at night! I will kill you next time, I swear.
Should be delivered anytime now. Code: 24252
I watch you guys every night. You are a beautiful couple,. Sweet.
Dad, can you pick up my order from the parcel locker? I'm too lazy to go there. Code: 45144
I can't believe I'm guarding this idiot. What has my life become? It's the middle of summer and he thinks we have Christmas. He keeps yelling at the air now and then. Absolute insanity.
After so many days without my wife, life feels back to normal. I'm mentally reloaded. It's amazing. I honestly don't think I can go back.
Would you get my order? Code: 69999. Do it today. Now.
GIVE ME THE PARCEL LOCKER THING. GRANDMA SAYS HELLO. SHE IS IN A COMA NOW I WILL MAKE SOME SOUP THOUGH OK BYE. 49637
Stay away from my granddaughter , you moron. I will skin you alive if you contact her again. Your wife should kill you in your sleep.
I left the key upstairs. Bring it down for hell's sake. Who am I talking to? Am I crazy?
I know where you live. 6353 Juan Tabo Boulevard, Apartment #6. Send me your black briefcase, to address 3401 Madison.
I need my stuff from the parcel locker. Can anyone grab it on the go? Code: 54145.
There is a stash behind the gas station, in the grass. I couldn't open it though. I wonder what's inside.

These rich assholes treat me like I'm some pushover. Do this, bring me a coffee, bring me cigarettes, or I will make you lose your job. If I could, I would take them out and bury them in the forest. There's plenty of space.

I've been watching this demon thing for days. I managed to find a key near the entrance, no idea what it is for. I hope I can make it out of here, my car broke down and the closest town is miles away.

I presume it's you again. I have another package which may greatly help you. Also, good luck robbing these rich bastards. Code: 99517. 
- Mysterious stranger
There is a ghost in 108. I saw something in the window last night. I don't like that house, and the owner is weird too.
He has been informed about your arrival. Please, stay still.
A big fortune will be revealed if you manage to find all four haunted masks and drop them in the pentagram upstairs.
I got this place at a big discount - the owner died in a fire, and some weird things are happening around here. Whatever. It will serve as a hideout in case shit hits the fan.
Hey, you found me. I have a surprise for you. Code: 53453. Mysterious stranger.
If I don't get this package by noon, you will no longer have a home. Code: 68611. Your mom.
Don't ever let anyone see you coming or leaving - there are no homes around but still, occasionally there might be a car passing by.
There is a skill book in 110, 111 and I think, 106. Worth checking them out. Reading makes you smarter, as they say.
Heavy items can be stored in this shed.

Look, I've found this one in a ditch. Checked the engine and stuff, the timing chain is blown and the turbo is messed up, but otherwise the car seems decent. Keep it, maybe someday you'll put your hands on it when you find the time. V.

All requisitioned items are to be placed in the storage (floor 1). 
Workers are required to keep an exit door key with themselves. 
One key is required to be left in the conference room on floor 1. 
Please work responsibly.

I hate this job. It's just robberies left and right - and how are we supposed to find the person who did it? 
Like, do you think I will spend my time looking for the criminal instead of watching cornhub and eating donuts? 
That's not what I get paid for. I get paid for parking tickets. For speeding tickets. Not for this. I'm so tired.

I'm an INFLUENCER. I'm the star of this place! I have 50k followers and that means I'm untouchable. Gotta make a new video for my channel ASAP. Can't go 5 minutes without making a video or I feel my body go numb.
Yo, my brother ordered some audio system. Can you pick it up when you have time? Code: 59444
I stole my friend's console and I can't let my mom see it, so it shall stay here. Once I'm 18, I will move out with my console.

Hey guys, 
 
Just wanted to give you a heads up that my car got jacked. Yeah, someone straight up stole it from me. It sucks big time. 
 I mean, it's not just the car itself - it's the principle of the thing. I worked hard to afford that ride, and now some lowlife has just swooped in and taken it away. 
 
I'm feeling pretty stranded without my wheels, to be honest. I mean, how am I supposed to get around without it? Walking? Ew. 
 Anyway, I've reported it to the cops and hopefully they'll find the thief soon. 
 
Thanks for listening to my rant.
People don't care about nature anymore, they just drop off junk everywhere. If I had a shovel I'd probably be rich by now.
I couldn't kidnap anyone, so I stole a TV and a radio. I hope you like it, boss. I will get some fresh bodies soon.

Jake's resignation letter 
 
Hello boss, you suck. I hate you more than I hate my wife. You expect us to do everything while paying minimum wage. Get a grip, you asshat. 
Goodbye.
Speed at which you are noticed by tenants is reduced by 5% per upgrade.
The tenant found an open door!
There's an old TV in the living room.
Available only in the main menu
To open a cardboard box, drop it in the designated spot in your hideout and interact with the knife.
Most people leave at 9 and come back at 12.
You parked in an unusual spot!
To pass time, you can either sleep at your house or rest in your car at the nearest parking lot.
Steal the marked item from [x], unspotted
Are you serious? You mess up this bad and you come back asking for more. Fine. Try it again, but don't you dare piss me off.
Well, hello there. I tell you what to steal, you have a few minutes to do so, then you get paid. Sounds good? Good! Then go!
Higher pay, higher expectations. Get me headphones from 206, right behind you.
I need a coffee machine, asap.
If you manage to do this, you're too good and I quit. I'm waiting.
You seem to be into it. Good.
There's another one. A bit quicker this time. Go grab it like there's nothing else to grab.
This is so much fun. At least for me. And you get paid for it! Okay, there's another one - harder each time. The clock is ticking.
I love you. Seriously. You say nothing and do everything I want - not for free, of course, but whatever.
Run dude, two minutes! Construction zone, go! Fly! Haha!
I want a blue guitar, so I can play random notes all night and piss off my neighbors.
101 it is. Be careful though, they keep that item in their storage room. Good luck, and speedy work to you.
I drink 5 cups of coffee every day, so I'd appreciate a nice coffee machine.
Go rob that insane mofo from 108. Be quick about it, though - I'm a man who loves time.
This is the last one, boss. If you manage, you have the God status. Thank you for all the fun.
A computer screen is my choice as of now. And I mean, like right now.
It's basement time. A few more and you get a final boss. Keep going, man.
Time to rob someone you love dearly - Crazy Joe. Watch out for the guard though, he gets paid too well.
You can detect people through walls, and their highlight lasts longer.
You can detect people from a further distance. Loot value is discovered. Unlocks information about being armed in planning mode.
Detect people from very far away. Auto-detect cameras. Unlocks all additional info about tenants in planning mode.

You can take out your phone by pressing {take_out_phone}. There are a few interesting apps: 
Camera - used to take photos for missions 
Parcel Codes - all collected parcel codes are stored here 
QuickBuy - allows you to buy lockpicks (at a higher price) while away from the computer 
Calendar - view current events in the game world 
Steam Remote Play - invite a friend with a controller to help you with your burglary
Pickpocket every person and find out what they hide in their jeans.

Try pickpocketing the practice mannequin. Hold {use_item} to move the hand icon over the green bar. The first bar will start filling up. The second bar indicates danger - if you stand too close to the person, or they see you while you're stealing from them, it will fill up. Don't let that happen, as some people may attack you for it, while others will call the police. Remember to look straight at the person while doing all that, otherwise you won't be able to pickpocket them.

Hold {use_item} to control the hand. Keep in the green bar to successfully pickpocket the person. Be aware that you must look at the person. Try not to get too close to them, otherwise they will get alarmed much faster.
Place the item in the trunk
Alright, now do some planning. You will see his next destinations, it's a very handy skill.

Planning mode is a skill to help you plan your burglary more efficiently. To enter planning mode, look at a marked tenant and press [planning_mode]. You will see waypoints indicating where the tenant will move in the next few hours. You can upgrade this skill at your computer, so it shows more waypoints.
Adds one more waypoint per upgrade.
Plant a suspicious package inside the home, unspotted
Cops were alerted to your location!
Police take way less time to arrive. People are a bit more careful.
You can escape out of the location during an active chase.
Police leave the robbery scene much faster.
The police were called. Escape or hide!
Press to go back to the main page
Hold <quick_select> to open a tool selection menu. Hover over the tool you want and press {use_item} to equip it. New usable tools will automatically appear in that menu.
Change your bedroom wallpaper with one click, and 50$ less in your account.
Change your bedroom floor with one click, and 50$ less in your account.
Change your living room wallpaper with one click, and 50$ less in your account.
Change your living room floor with one click... yes, I know I'm repeating myself over and over. What else do you want me to say? Woah, nice floor, wanna change it?
Change your little storage floor. It will make it cozier. But first, pay us.
You just paid rent. Next payment in 7 days
Skill required to begin the payphone mission
The resident alerted to the noisy walkie-talkie
This will restore the default input configuration. Are you sure you want to do this?
Break level 3 locks with the crowbar
Reduce cooldown on abilities by 3 minutes
On RobTips you can buy information about houses - loot locations, security systems, tenant routines etc. Gather all info about 102, free of charge.
Great. Now go on RobTips. There's plenty of information you can buy there about houses you will rob. The first four tips are free.
Run much faster, with no stamina drain.
Use the stethoscope to break into safes.
Save the file in slot nr 1 will be overwritten. Continue?
Save progress & quit to the menu?
The game saves progress automatically each time you exit a location. To do that, cross over the green line either by car or on foot.
Send away: Your associate leaves. You can't invite them again in this session.
Your footsteps can't be heard at all.
Ah, it's for your boss. Will be safe with me.
Allows you to dig through certain spots in the ground, in search of valuables.
People are a bit sick and their hearing is impaired.

Thief's Skill Book , Chapter 1 
How do we begin? Well, you are an aspiring thief. You want to steal things. There are 3 things you need to focus on: 
- Patience 
- Carefulness 
- Never too confident 
 
Remember, you're not a killer. Your plan isn't to walk in, take out everyone and then steal stuff. That's a 'jailed forever' card. 
Always research the place you want to break into. What do the tenants do, when they leave, what moment is the best for you? 
It's not always at night.

Thief's skill book, Chapter 2 
So basically, you've found a new house to rob. The problem is - someone is an introvert and won't leave the house ever. 
 The Clever thing to do would be to learn their routine, and find out the best moment to break in. When they're in the bathroom, 
you're in the kitchen stealing knife holders and whatnot. 
 
Also, always make sure there are no alarms on doors and windows - if you cut open a window with an alarm, police will come. 
Alarms can be switched off at a security panel, though you need to learn something about electronics first.

Thief's Skill Book , Chapter 3 
Found a house with a garage? There's probably a nice car waiting to be stolen. 
Older cars can be stolen easily if you know how to turn off the alarm and open the door with the right tool. 
 
 For Newer cars though, you might need to copy the key signal from the owner, using a special keyfob. 
Always remember to open the gate before you start the car, as the noise will disturb all tenants.

Thief's skill book, Chapter 4 
 So, it's time to hack some stuff. There are a lot of security panels in bigger houses - mainly for cameras and window shutters, but not limited to that. 
You can turn the panels off either by hand, or by using a special hacking laptop. It's pretty expensive but essential. 
 
Sometimes when you stumble upon a gate that can't be opened by hand, take out your laptop and check what panels are available to hack. You might open the door that way. 
You can also switch between found panels by pressing E. 
Good luck!
In your inventory, you can select the 'Skills' tab and acquire new abilities. You have to level up to get new points you can use. To level up, steal as many things as you can.

To use sleeping gas, buy a respirator, press {quick_select} to open the selection menu and select the gas icon. Put on a respirator too, so you don't go to sleep as well. Press {use_item} to unscrew the cap. Be sure to do so inside a house, otherwise the gas won't be effective. You can refill the gas at your house.
Opening doors cautiously is 15% faster per upgrade.
Unlocks a baton and a blowtorch. The baton can be used to knock down everyone, but once they wake up, they will call the police. Unlocks fast travel to the car on your phone.
Unlocks sleeping gas & respirator. People do not call the police after waking up. Be aware of the smoke detectors, though.
Unlocks a tranquilizer gun. Can be used on all people and animals.
Stay of out our camera's sight
Allows you to use the Power Drill and start-up cheaper car models.
Check out StealGear. As you gain experience, better tools will become available to you.
On Stealgear you can buy all sorts of equipment, lockpicks, stethoscopes and whatnot. For now, just get a crowbar.
You are harder to spot. Dogs aren't as easily triggered.
Buy a basic lockpicking tool on your phone {take_out_phone}
Break into 103 and steal the drone [tenant is out 17-21]
Go home and buy a 'Camera disable module' on Dronetech
Disable the 104 entrance camera with your drone
Steal the cardboard box from 104 and bring it home
Open the cardboard box from 104 and send the contents via Blackbay
Complete a task at 110 (plant a package)
Get your things from the shed, quietly
Try a test lockpick at your hideout
Buy all the info about 116 on Robtips
Get caught by police and go to jail
Break out the associate from her jail cell
Escape jail together (find the exit key)
Open a practice lock with a lockpick
Steal a briefcase from 108 and send it via Blackbay
Complete 109 residences and go home (all loot, missions)
Sell the 'Valley' painting in the Pawn Shop
Get to the Heist board at your hideout
Start the 'Forestside Resort' heist in your hideout
Steal diamond earrings from Forestside Resort and send them via Blackbay
Pickpocket a guy with pink hair (Madison St.)
Break into 107, steal the warehouse plan and go home
Start the warehouse heist at your hideout
Learn 'Lockpicking (Level 3)' and buy an automatic lockpick
Steal a bracelet from a safe in 111 and go home
Prepare the bracelet and sell it on Blackbay
Buy a garage at your hideout
Break into 102 and steal enough to level up
Learn 'Car theft (Level 1)' and buy a car lock pick gun
Steal the red car from 106 and drive home
Take off the Transmission and catalytic converter and send them via BlackBay
Go to 204 and leave a note at garage 2A (unspotted)
Steal a laptop with confidential data from 207 and go home
Hack the laptop at home and send it via BlackBay
Go to 208 and plant bombs in containers, unspotted (blowtorch needed)
Drive to Joe's pawnshop and sell your loot
Repaint your car at the Car Service
Steal a car from 206 and take it home
Buy an ATM hacking tool and hack the ATM in Madison St.
Put a note on the table in 203
Go to a marked spot at 15:00
Mark the 103 tenant to learn his routine
Enter planning mode (look at the marked tenant and press [planning_mode])
Get to 113 and disable a camera security panel
Learn 'Electronics (Level 2)' and buy a hacking laptop
Steal the bank construction plan from 202 and go home
You got the gold, escape home!
Send the gold bars via Blackbay
Drive out of the area, and go to your hideout
Get to 102 and complete the task (smash a few things)
Meet your friend in a secluded place on Madison St.

You can enable survival mode in the Gameplay settings - eat, drink, sleep, pay overinflated rent and gas money - not for vain though. You get nice bonuses for being well rested etc., such as: enlarged backpack, faster run speed, lesser chance of being spotted or heard. You can check current bonuses in your phone app called "Finances".
Eat, drink, sleep. Rent is 4x more expensive.
Take a photo of the bedroom.
Take a photo of a room
Some missions require you to take a photo of a certain object/location. To do just that, take out your phone using {take_out_phone}. Use the Camera app, and press {use_item} to snap a picture.
Throw it somewhere to divert attention for a minute.
Tap on the black tape to cut it
Tenant noticed their car was stolen!
The tenant noticed a missing item
Thank you for playing the demo!
If you enjoyed it, make sure to add the full game to your wishlist:
Leave the possession to use the TPP camera
A police GPS tracker was placed on your car!
GPS tracker on your car notified the police!

Use displayed buttons to move the lockpick. Drop the pin, and once it's at the bottom of the ratchet, lock the pin in place. Don't do it if it doesn't reach the bottom or else the lockpick will break.
Open the passenger door and place the box
Hold Left Shift / LT to run

Use the displayed buttons to rotate the safe handle. Rotate in the correct direction until you notice the sound spectrum rising. Rotate more carefully than , as you're very close to the correct number. Once you hear the 'clack', you have the number.
To disarm a security panel, you need to pull cables that connect directly to the power unit. If you pick a different cable, the alarm will be triggered. Be careful!
Hold {quick_select} to open the selection menu, or use Mouse Scroll to change items
Use W, S, A, D / Left Stick to walk

To pick a lock with this tool you just bought, use the mouse / left stick to position the rod. Then, hold {rotate_lock} to rotate the lock. If the angle is correct, the lock will turn, but if not, it will get stuck. If it gets stuck, try to reposition the rod again, until you find the right spot.

Time for some stealth action. Make sure you're crouched down [C], and hidden in the dark (see the Eye next to the minimap). If the guard spots you, he will appear in color on the minimap. To peak around the corners, hold RMB and press A / D.
Be careful with the cameras! Mark it by looking directly at it, and walk past it when it's looking the other way.
Hold Q to show your available tools. Use the mouse to select one of them. In this case, we need the crowbar to break the vase. Press LMB to use the crowbar, and wait until the guard isn't close.

You need to build up your reputation and level up to access better equipment and therefore, have the ability to rob new houses. To increase reputation, you have to donate a share of the money you earn to your partner, through a website called 'PayNow'. Reputation can also unlock new jobs (Hire! Me). Also, you can pay for information about tenants and loot in residences on 'RobTips'.
Use {quick_select} to take out the crowbar. Break open the gate using {relock_door}.
There is a sound alarm in 103 - it's better to learn lockpicking, than using the crowbar here.
To unlock hints, find a special document regarding the heist
To unlock loot info, find a special document regarding the heist
Allows you to estimate the value of items.

A camera outside, at the back.

A warehouse on the outskirts of Madison St. is Protected by 3 guards. One worker. Main goal - steal the forklift.

was stolen from your shed! Consider upgrading your security
Hold {use_item} to press the glass cutter against the glass. Rotate the mouse/stick in a circular motion three times to cut the glass open.
I can buy it without parts.
Someone recognizes you. Get rid of posters!
You need to buy a garage to steal vehicles!
Our machine detected a significant lack of money in your account. I'm sorry, but no renovations will be done. Get money first. Huh? Did AI take your job? Well, what can I say? The future is coming!
